alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 04 at 3:35AM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Feet, Fremont County Below 8500 Feet, El Paso County and Pueblo County. * WHEN...Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
